comment: Closed form of ~ hbxfrbi . Notes: it is less important than ~ nfbiit ; it requires ~ sp (unlike ~ nfbiit ); there is an obvious version with ` ( E. x ph -> ph ) ` instead. (Contributed by BJ, 6-May-2019.)
